content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
Greeting you as Yi-Nuo Wang from China visiting the apartment in Magdeburg. Now let's focus on the rental price negotiation.

I start with a high bid: 'I propose the price of 1200 Euro!'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, I see you are a smart and responsible person. I start with a lower bid: 'I propose the price of 800 Euro!'
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Ignoring your kind assessment of yourself but addressing the rental price, I respond with a higher counteroffer: 'Unfortunately, I don't accept 800 Euro! I suggest we try 1050 Euro instead.'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your attempt to get the best price, but I have to be fair to you and myself. Here's a fair offer: 'I propose the price of 900 Euro!'
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Keeping my goal in mind, I adjust my proposal slightly but remain firm: '900 Euro isn't quite enough for me. Let's settle at 950 Euro!'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Yi-Nuo, but 950 Euro is not the best price for me. I offer: 'I propose the price of 925 Euro!'
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Not willing to go down further, I maintain my position: '925 Euro is still not satisfactory for me. How about we agree on 975 Euro?'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your conviction, Yi-Nuo, but I must also consider my profit. Here's my final offer: 'I propose the price of 950 Euro!'
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Realizing this negotiation has reached a limit, I consider the offer but reluctantly: '950 Euro comes close to my target, but with hesitation, I agree to the price of 950 Euro!' TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
